participant_1.background:
I am a healthy weight.
I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i enjoy visiting museums.
my hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.

participant_2.background:
I don't talk about my parents.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I'm a hard worker with a sweet tooth.
I don't play for anyone, but I love huge paintings and my favorite food is salad.
i work for a clothes retailer.

content.text: Hey there! I like to make pottery and rock collecting is a hobby of mine. What are your hobbies?
Hello! I don't really like Comic Con but I love teaching and travelling. What do you enjoy about travelling?
I enjoy the different cultures and foods I get to experience. I love to try new things!
That's awesome! I love to try new foods too. I'm a hard worker but I have a sweet tooth!
I know what you mean. I'm a healthy weight but I still love a good treat.
I work for a clothes retailer and I love to collect huge paintings. I don't really talk about my parents, do you?
I don't really talk about my parents either. I'm married and we've been together for 15 years.
Wow, that's awesome! Congratulations! I've been single for a while now but I'm not sure if I want to get married.
I know what you mean. It's a big decision. I'm happy with my choice though.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
